mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.out_plan_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS label, (o.order_amount * p.prod_price) AS data FROM orders o JOIN product p ON o.prod_name = p.prod_name WHERE o.order_amount IS NOT NULL GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(o.out_plan_DATE, '%Y-%m'), o.order_amount, o.out_plan_DATE, p.prod_price ORDER BY o.out_plan_DATE ASC LIMIT 6

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(done_date, '%Y-%m')AS label, good_prod AS data, faulty_prod AS data1 FROM result GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(done_date, '%Y-%m'), good_prod, faulty_prod, done_date ORDER BY done_date ASC LIMIT 6
